title: The First Round: The Close, the Not, and the Swept | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the competitive first-round matchups (1:16), teams that are figuratively on the ropes (28:37), and the already-concluded series (52:52).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
